System

Configuration

Date & Time

  1. Set universal timezone1):

    # ln -sf /usr/share/zoneinfo/UTC /etc/localtime

Hostname

  1. Set hostname2):

    # echo '<HOSTNAME>' > /etc/hostname

    Note: Reboot is required.

Login Messages

  1. Clear pre-login and post-login messages:

    # echo '' > /etc/issue
# echo '' > /etc/motd

1)
Timezone leaks: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Data_Collection_Techniques#Fingerprinting_and_Anonymity.
2)
Hostname leaks: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Hostnames#Privacy_Risks.
